full_description:
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n     Must Have Technical/Functional Skills\n
\n
\n
Proven experience in Business Intelligence, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, and Data Mining.
\n
\n
\n
Proficiency in BI tools such as Power BI, Tableau, QlikView, or similar.
\n
\n
\n
Strong SQL skills and experience with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server, PostgreSQL).
\n
\n
\n
Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and ETL processes.
\n
\n
\n
Experience with statistical analysis and tools like Python, R, or SAS is a plus.
\n
\n
\n
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
\n
\n
\n
Strong communication and presentation skills.
\n
\n
\n     Roles & Responsibilities\n
\n
\n
Design, develop, and maintain BI solutions (dashboards, reports, data visualizations).
\n
\n
\n
Perform data modeling to support analytics and reporting needs.
\n
\n
\n
Conduct in-depth data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities.
\n
\n
\n
Apply data mining techniques to uncover hidden insights and support predictive analytics.
\n
\n
\n
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into data-driven solutions.
\n
\n
\n
Ensure data integrity and optimize data pipelines for performance and scalability.
\n
\n
\n
Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and compelling manner.
\n
\n
\n     Generic Managerial Skills, If any\n
\n
\n
Experience in cloud platforms (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP) and big data technologies.
\n
\n
\n
Knowledge of machine learning concepts and their application in business analytics.
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n     Salary Range: $110,000 $140,000 Year\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n     TCS Employee Benefits Summary:\n
\n
\n     Discretionary Annual Incentive.\n
\n
\n     Comprehensive Medical Coverage: Medical & Health, Dental & Vision, Disability Planning & Insurance, Pet Insurance Plans.\n
\n
\n     Family Support: Maternal & Parental Leaves.\n
\n
\n     Insurance Options: Auto & Home Insurance, Identity Theft Protection.\n
\n
\n     Convenience & Professional Growth: Commuter Benefits & Certification & amp; Training Reimbursement.\n
\n
\n     Time Off: Vacation, Time Off, Sick Leave & Holidays.\n
\n
\n     Legal & Financial Assistance: Legal Assistance, 401K Plan, Performance Bonus, College Fund, Student Loan Refinancing.\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n     #LI-SP1\n
\n
